Name: The Break-In!
desc: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Secret Rendezvous
desc: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Assault on NORAD
desc: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step 1 of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facd down, engaged with them as a Drone minion.

Name: Countdown to Oblivion
desc: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Unleashing the Mutagen
desc: When Completed: In player order, each player not engaged with a Goblin minion must discard 3 cards from the encounter deck and put the first Goblin minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.

Name: Mutagen Cloud
desc: INC is equal to the number of Goblin enemies (including Green Goblin) in play. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Goblin Nation
desc: Each Goblin enemy (including Green Goblin) gets +1 ATK

Name: Overrun
desc: When Defeated: In player order, each player must discard 2 cards from the encounter deck and put each Goblin minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.

Name: Hostile Takeover
desc: When Completed, Place 1x infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise. Then, discard 1 card from each player's deck for each infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise.

Name: Corporate Acquisition
desc: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Power Drain
desc: When Defeated: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player must choose and discard 1 resource of any type from their hand for each boost icon discarded this way.
